Test Description:
1) Create 2-way mirrored volumes.
2) Run IOs on the volume. 
3) Detach the volume
4) Add a new plex (3rd one). 
5) Attach the volume. The newly added plex should go in Resyncing state. Wait for its resync to complete.
6) Calculate sha512sum across all plexes. They should be same.

1) Create 2-way mirrored volumes.
2) Run IOs on the volume. 
3) Detach the volume
4) Add a new plex (3rd one). 
5) Attach the volume. The newly added plex should go in Resyncing state.
6) While the plex is resyncing, reboot the node where current plex is added.
7) After the node comes up, resync should trigger again and complete.
8) Calculate sha512sum across all plexes. They should be same.

1) Create 2-way mirrored volumes.
2) Run IOs on the volume. Allow IOs to complete.
3) Don't detach the volume
4) Add a new plex (3rd one). The newly added plex should go in Resyncing state. Wait for its resync to complete.
5) Calculate sha512sum across all plexes. They should be same.

1) Create 2-way mirrored volumes.
2) Run IOs on the volume. 
3) While the IOs are still running, add a new plex (3rd one). The newly added plex should go in Resyncing state.
4) Allow resync to complete.
5) Calculate sha512sum across all plexes. They should be same.

1) Create 2-way mirrored volumes.
2) Run IOs on the volume. 
3) While the IOs are still running, reboot one of the target node.
4) While the plexes of the rebooted target node are undergoing resync, add a new plex (3rd one). The newly added plex should go in Resyncing state.
5) Allow resync to complete.
6) Calculate sha512sum across all plexes. They should be same.

1) Create 2-way mirrored volumes.
2) Run IOs on the volume. 
3) While the IOs are still running, add a new plex (3rd one). The newly added plex should go in Resyncing state.
4) While the plexes are undergoing resync, reboot the node where newly added plexes exist.
5) After the node comes up, allow resync to complete.
6) Calculate sha512sum across all plexes. They should be same.

1) Create 2-way mirrored volumes.
2) Run IOs on the volume. 
3) While the IOs are still running, reboot one of the target node.
4) While the plexes of the rebooted target node are undergoing resync, add a new plex (3rd one). The newly added plex should go in Resyncing state.
5) While the newly added plexes are undergoing resync, run fio with different pattern on the volume
6) Allow the fio and plex resync to complete.
7) Calculate sha512sum across all plexes. They should be same.

1) Create a single plex volume. 
2) Create a pod that would attach this volume. File system is automatically created on this volume.
3) Now add a plex to this volume in attached mode. The file system should be created on this plex and it should start resyncing
4) Ensure resync completes and all plexes are in Inysnc state

1) Create a single plex volume. 
2) Create a pod that would attach this volume. File system is automatically created on this volume.
3) Now add a plex to this volume in attached mode. The file system should be created on this plex and it should start resyncing
4) While the plexes are undergoing resync, reboot the node where plex is resyncing.
5) After reboot, plexes should start resyncing again.
6) Ensure resync completes and all plexes are in Inysnc state

1) Create a single plex volume. 
2) Create a pod that would attach this volume. File system is automatically created on this volume.
3) Allow the pod to run for some time and write data.
4) Delete the pod. Volume will be in available state.
5) Now add a plex to this volume.
6) Re-create the pod again. The volume should mount and pod should go in Running state. The newly added plex should go into Resyncing state.
7) Ensure resync completes and all plexes are in Inysnc state

1) Create 8 simple volumes. Attach volumes. 
2) Add new plex to each volume. 
3) Allow resync to complete.
4) Add another plex. Allow resync to complete
5) Calculate sha512sum across all plexes. They should match

1. Create 8 simple volumes.
2. Attach volumes.
3. Do write IOs.
4. Add new plex to simple volumes.
5. When the plex starts resyncing, add another plex.
6. Allow resync to complete on all the plexes
7. Validate data on each plex.

1) Create a single plex volume. 
2) Create file system on this volume and mount it. 
3) Create a file inside the mounted directory and write something on it. Calculate sha512sum of the file.
4) Add a plex to this volume. File system creation and mount should happen on this newly added plex. 
5) Allow plex to complete resync. Check the mounted directory on this new plex. It should contain same file. Calculate sha512sum of this file. It should match with the one previously calculated

1) Create 4 single plex volumes on nodeA and nodeB
2) Attach all the 8 volumes to nodeA (4 local + 4 remote)
3) Add a plex for the remote volumes such that the new plexes get created on nodeA
4) Run IOs on the remote volumes. 
5) Reboot Initiator node (nodeA) while the IOs are stilll running 
6) After node nodeA comes up, check the cluster, nodes, volumes are fine (up and available). 
7) Calculate sha512sum across all plexes and volumes. It should match

1) Create a single plex volume of max volume size / available space on the node. 
2) Attach it to a node.
3) Run fio on the volume such that data is spread across the volume
4) Calculate sha512sum of the volume.
5) Add a plex to the volume while it is still attached. Allow plex to resync.
6) Calculate sha512sum of the newly added plex. Should match with value calculated in step 4.
7) Delete the newly added plex. Delete should be successful.
8) Detach and delete the volume

1) Create a single plex volume of max volume size / available space on the node. 
2) Attach it to a node.
3) Run fio on the volume such that data is spread across the volume
4) Calculate sha512sum of the volume.
5) Detach the volume.
6) Add a plex to the volume. Attach the volume. Allow plex to resync.
7) Calculate sha512sum of the newly added plex. Should match with value calculated in step 4.
8) Detach the volume. 
9) Delete the newly added plex. Delete should be successful.
8) Delete the volume

1) Create 3-way mirrored volumes.
2) Run IOs on all the volumes. Allow fio to complete
3) Detach and delete a target plex from all volumes.
4) Plexes should get deleted successfully

1) Create 3-way mirrored volumes.
2) Run IOs on all the volumes.
3) While the IOs are still running, detach and delete a plex from all volumes.
4) Plexes should get deleted successfully

1) Create 3 way mirrored volumes. 
2) Run IOs on all the volumes. 
3) Calculate sha512sum of all the plexes of all volumes (cksum1)
4) Detach and delete 2 target plexes from each volume.
5) Both the plexes should get deleted successfully.
6) Modify the volume to 3-way mirrored (first 2 way and then 3-way).
7) Both the plexes should undergo Resync
8) After resync completes, calculate sha512sum (cksum2)
9) cksum2 should match with cksum1

1) Create 3 way mirrored volumes. 
2) Run IOs on all the volumes. 
3) Calculate sha512sum of all the plexes of all volumes (cksum1)
4) Detach and delete 2 target plexes from each volume.
5) Both the plexes should get deleted successfully.
6) Modify the volume to 3-way mirrored (first 2 way and then 3-way).
7) Both the plexes should undergo Resync.
8) While the resync is in progress, reboot one of the node which has plex in resyncing state. 
9) Allow resync to complete after reboot. 
10) Calculate sha512sum of all plexes across all volumes (cksum2). 
11) cksum2 should match with cksum1

1) Create 3 way mirrored volumes. 
2) Run IOs on all the volumes. 
3) Calculate sha512sum of all the plexes of all volumes (cksum1)
4) Detach and delete 2 target plexes from each volume.
5) Both the plexes should get deleted successfully.
6) Modify the volume to 3-way mirrored (first 2 way and then 3-way).
7) Both the plexes should undergo Resync.
8) While the resync is in progress, reboot the initiator node which has plex in InUse state. 
9) Allow resync to complete after reboot. 
10) Calculate sha512sum of all plexes across all volumes (cksum2). 
11) cksum2 should match with cksum1

1) Create 8 2-way mirrored volumes. Attach 4 volumes to node1 & 4 volumes to node 2.
2) Run IOs on all the volumes simultaneously. Detach the volumes.
3) Modify all volumes to 3-way mirrored using dctl volume modify cmd.
4) Attach all of them to same node. Allow the newly added plex to complete Resync.
5) Detach all the volumes. 
6) Delete one plex each (random plex) from all the volumes. 
7) Re-attach all the volumes to some node. Detach the volumes again.
8) Modify all the volumes to 3-way mirrored. Attach all the volumes to some node.
9) Newly added plex should undergo Resync.
10) sha512sum should match across all plexes.

1) Create 8 2-way mirrored volumes. Attach 4 volumes to node1 & 4 volumes to node 2.
2) Run IOs on all the volumes simultaneously. 
3) Without detaching the volumes, modify all volumes to 3-way mirrored using dctl volume modify cmd.
4) Allow the newly added plex to complete Resync.
5) Delete one plex each (random plex) from all the volumes. 
6) Modify all the volumes to 3-way mirrored. 
7) Newly added plex should undergo Resync. 
8) sha512sum should match across all plexes

1) Create 8 2-way mirrored volumes. Attach 4 volumes to node1 & 4 volumes to node 2.
2) Run IOs on all the volumes simultaneously. 
3) Without detaching the volumes, modify all volumes to 3-way mirrored using dctl volume modify cmd.
4) Allow the newly added plex to complete Resync.
5) Delete one plex each (random plex) from all the volumes. 
6) Modify all the volumes to 3-way mirrored. 
7) Newly added plex should undergo Resync. 
8) While the plex resync is in progress, reboot the node which has plexes in Resyncing state.
9) After the nodes are up, allow plexes to complete resync.
10) sha512sum should match across all plexes

1) Create mirrored volumes and attach them.
2) Detach one of the plexes
3) Run IOs on all the volumes. Allow IOs to complete.
4) Re-attach the plexes. Allow plexes to resync
5) Calculate sha512sum across all the plexes of volumes. They should match

1) Create 3-way mirrored volumes and attach them.
2) Detach two plexes
3) Run IOs on all the volumes. Allow IOs to complete.
4) Re-attach the plexes. Allow plexes to resync
5) Calculate sha512sum across all the plexes of volumes. They should match

1) Create 3-way mirrored volumes and attach them.
2) Run IOs on all the volumes.
3) While the IOs are still running, detach one or two plexes from each volume. 
4) Allow IOs to complete. 
5) Re-attach the plexes. Allow plexes to resync
6) Calculate sha512sum across all the plexes of volumes. They should match

1) Create 3-way mirrored volumes and attach them.
2) Run fio with write pattern on all the volumes.
3) Change the preferred plex manually of all volumes such that they belong to some particular node 
4) Run fio with verify pattern on all the volumes. 
5) While the verification is running, reboot the node where preferred plex exists.
6) Pattern verification should succeed.

1) Create 3-way mirrored volumes and attach them.
2) Run fio with write pattern on all the volumes.
3) Change the preferred plex manually of all volumes such that they belong to 2 nodes 
4) Run fio with verify pattern on all the volumes.
5) While the verification is running, reboot both the nodes where preferred plex exists.
6) Pattern verification should succeed.

1) Create 3-way mirrored volumes and attach them
2) Start running IOs on the volumes.
3) During IOs detach one plex from each volume
4) Wait for few seconds. 
5) While the IOs are still running, detach another plex.
6) Allow IOs to complete. There shouldn't be any IO errors
7) Reattach detached plexes. Let resync happen.
8) Calculate sha512sum across all plexes. They should match

1) Create 3-way mirrored volumes and attach them
2) Start running IOs on the volumes.
3) During IOs detach one plex from each volume
4) Wait for few seconds. 
5) While the IOs are still running, detach another plex.
6) Wait for few seconds. There shouldn't be any IO errors
7) While the IOs are still running, re-attach the detached plexes. Let resync happen.
8) Calculate sha512sum across all plexes. They should match

1) Create 3-way mirrored volumes and attach them
2) Start running IOs on the volumes.
3) During IOs detach one plex from each volume
4) Wait for few seconds. 
5) While the IOs are still running, detach another plex.
6) Wait for few seconds. There shouldn't be any IO errors
7) While the IOs are still running, re-attach the detached plexes. 
8) While the plexes are resyncing, reboot the initiator node. Resyncing should resume
9) After resync completes, calculate sha512sum across all plexes. They should match

1) Create 3-way mirrored volumes and attach them
2) Start running IOs on the volumes.
3) During IOs detach one plex from each volume
4) Wait for few seconds. 
5) While the IOs are still running, detach another plex.
6) Wait for few seconds. There shouldn't be any IO errors
7) While the IOs are still running, re-attach the detached plexes. 
8) While the plexes are resyncing, reboot one of the target nodes. Resyncing should resume
9) After resync completes, calculate sha512sum across all plexes. They should match
